abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: Releases a cone of poison that damages enemies over time and slows their movement speed. The slow increases with each enemy attack.
abilities.notes: Slow intensifies with each attack against the affected target.

abilities.name: Shallow Grave
abilities.description: When cast on an ally, prevents them from dying. Their health cannot go below 1 HP for the duration. Also grants heal amplification based on missing health.
abilities.notes: Can be cast on spell immune allies. Cannot be purged.

abilities.name: Shadow Wave
abilities.description: Sends out a wave of healing shadow energy that heals friendly units and damages nearby enemies. The wave bounces between nearby allies.
abilities.notes: Heals allies and damages enemies near those allies. Damage is physical and affected by armor values.

abilities.name: Nothl Projection
abilities.description: Dazzle creates a shadow version of himself that can cast abilities with enhanced effects.
abilities.notes: Abilities cast during Nothl Projection have enhanced effects: Poison Touch applies hex, Shallow Grave heals upon expiration, Shadow Wave grants allies an instant attack.

innate_abilities.name: Weave
innate_abilities.description: Dazzle's abilities weave patterns of light and shadow, reducing armor of enemy units and increasing armor of allied units affected by his abilities.
innate_abilities.notes: Each time an enemy is affected by Dazzle's abilities, they lose armor. Each time an ally is affected, they gain armor.
